casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Reginald Underwood FULLARD 309P15-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Reginald Fullard, for Fullard, Reginald Underwood.

*248The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of April 2018 by Defendant for Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
